short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GTO poker randomizer for optimal GTO play.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Poker GTO randomizer is a simple randomizer tool to implement optimal GTO strategy while playing poker. 

Based on a random number generator, the extension provides several quick-access buttons that allow you to easily and quickly randomize common poker spots. 

For instance, if you're in a situation where you need to decide between taking an aggressive action 50% of the time and a passive action 50% of the time, simply click the "50/50" button. The result will be displayed in the action text box, which you can then use to guide your decision.It will display aggressive action exactly 50% of the time and passive action exactly 50% of the time.

This tool can also be use as random number generator. You can click on the "RNG" button if you need to generate a random number between 0 and 100. You can also auto-generate a random number every 5 seconds with the "Auto Generate" button.

The extension can be detached from the browser and used as a standalone window, which you can place anywhere on your desktop for added convenience.
